interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer
Review Date: 2020/11/08
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'}
Review Text: I’ve used this brand for years so I was excited to find this value pack! The packaging is beautiful and could make a nice Christmas gift. This is a great starter set to introduce someone to the brand. It comes with the cleanser, cream and serum. All the products are high quality and have been on my go to list for years. This is an excellent value.
Review Title: Value pack
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Caudalie Favorites Set
{'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'}
I am a big fan of caudalie products. This is a mini size kit and is perfect for travel. There are five products in this kit. I have sensitive skin and I always trust caudalie! Plus, the products always have a pleasant smell.
Favorite
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
I really like this face wash. I've used it just in my hands to wash my face really quickly, and I've also used it with my facial cleansing brush to get a deeper clean. It smells amazing. It has a thicker consistency and lathers, which I really like because it makes my face feel extra clean. Would buy this again!
Would repurchase!
LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'}
This has a great smell but I found the product was too thin for my damaged hair. I prefer a thicker hair cream spray.  If you’re looking for a very light spray, you may enjoy this product.
Not thick enough
Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer
{'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'}
I’ve used this brand for years so I was excited to find this value pack! The packaging is beautiful and could make a nice Christmas gift. This is a great starter set to introduce someone to the brand. It comes with the cleanser, cream and serum. All the products are high quality and have been on my go to list for years. This is an excellent value.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Preference**: The user has a strong inclination towards Caudalie products and is particularly enthusiastic about value sets that introduce others to the brand. They remain open to high-quality offerings from other brands, like Higher Education Skincare.

- **Skin Sensitivity**: Prioritizes products suitable for sensitive skin, showing a commitment to gentle and safe ingredients in skincare routines.

- **Product Formulation**: Enjoys liquid formulations for cleansing efficiency, but has shown an evolving preference for thicker formulations in hair care, indicating a nuanced approach to texture.

- **Convenience**: Values travel-friendly product sizes and appreciates gift-worthy packaging, suggesting a lifestyle that prioritizes portability and aesthetic appeal.

- **Fragrance**: Enjoys products with pleasant scents, emphasizing a preference for sensory experiences across skincare routines.

- **Quality Standards**: Consistently selects high-quality products, exemplified by their longstanding loyalty to trusted brands. They recognize excellent value in sets and kits that maintain quality across multiple products.

Overall, the user is health-conscious, committed to effective skincare suitable for sensitive skin, and continues to explore hair care with the same priorities. Their preferences for product textures, formulations, and convenience reflect a thoughtful beauty regimen that values both performance and sensory enjoyment.
